net.openhft.chronicle.network

Class ReadWithFlowControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.network.ReadWithFlowControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TcpEventHandler.SocketReader

    public final class ReadWithFlowControl
extends Object
implements TcpEventHandler.SocketReader
    provides flow control and back pressure to the the socket writer, so that only just one message is read at a time from the TCP/IP socket This class is only used in data grid
